alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Leavenworth; Wyandotte (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 2:42PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Wyandotte, southwestern Leavenworth and western Johnson Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 241 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Olathe, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Overland Park, Olathe, Shawnee, Lenexa, Gardner, Bonner Springs, De Soto, Tonganoxie, Basehor, Edwardsville, Edgerton, Lake Quivira, Kansas City, Linwood, Reno, Clare, Lackmans, Holliday and Clearview City. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 in Kansas between mile markers 212 and 225. Interstate 435 between mile markers 0 and 10, and between mile markers 82 and 83. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 206 and 225. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
